name: Attempting to log on to an incorrect CIF Credentials

testSteps.description: Given I am an authorized AIB staff member with incorrect CIF Credentials
When I attempt to log into the Application

children.description: Login staff member: User [staffID=17701, staffFirstName=OneView, staffLastName=TestAccount, region=ROI, application=oneview, platform=desktop, password=Summer10, branchName=Unknown, nsc=931012]

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: In order to prevent unauthorized access to non-AIB-staff members, as a system admin, I want valid users to authenticate before they access customer information

title: Attempting to log on to an incorrect CIF Credentials
